title: Audit Identity and Access Management (IAM) Program
description: An IT auditor performs a high-level review of the entire IAM program.

tasks.description: Verify that a formal IAM policy exists and has been approved by management.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the existence of an approved policy.

tasks.description: Check if a centralized IAM solution is in use, or if access is managed manually for each system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that access is managed manually and inconsistently across different applications.

tasks.description: Recommend the company invest in a centralized IAM solution to improve efficiency and security.
tasks.expected_outcome: A strategic recommendation is made to improve the overall IAM posture.
